name: Literally Just A Puzzle Block Game
name_original: Literally Just A Puzzle Block Game
description:
THE HTML5 VERSION HAS LIMITED FEATURES, I RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING THE GAMES EXECUTABLE.

Literally Just A Puzzle Block Game (or LJAPBG) is a recreation of a classic game in which you match up blocks to clear lines. 

The name explains it all.

Controls:

ActionKeyboardGamepadMove Left
Left Arrow / AD-Pad LeftMove RightRight Arrow / DD-Pad RightSoft DropDown Arrow / SD-Pad DownHard DropSpace / ControlD-Pad UpRotate RightUp Arrow / XBRotate LeftZ / QAHoldShift / CXPauseEscapeStart

Features:

  • 3 Game Modes (Marathon, Sprint, and Ultra)
  • Simple UI
  • A complete SRS rotation system
  • uhm
  • A high score system. (Doesn't work on browser)

Future Plans:

  • Online Multiplayer (its basically done)
  • Online Leaderboards
  • Modding Support (custom themes, backgrounds)
  • Mini Characters (custom characters that'll cheer you on as you play)
  • Some new game modes.
  • Open source? (i really wanna open source the project at one point)
  • Customizable Boards (wanna play with 3x10 board? go ahead.)
  • And much more...

I created this as a passion project to learn the fundamentals of making a clone of said puzzle block game. I do not make any profit from this game.
